                java.lang.String _AccessTokenSecret)
instantiate an authorized FTwitter register your app at dev.twitter.com in order to get consumer key and secret

Parameters:
papplet - PApplet
_ConsumerKey - authorization consumer key
_ConsumerSecret - authorization consumer secret
_AccessToken - access token
_AccessTokenSecret - access token secret
Method Detail

setAuthorization

public void setAuthorization(java.lang.String _ConsumerKey,
                             java.lang.String _ConsumerSecret,
                             java.lang.String _AccessToken,
                             java.lang.String _AccessTokenSecret)
register your app at dev.twitter.com in order to get consumer key and secret authorization methods copied from https://github.com/RobotGrrl/Simple-Processing-Twitter http://RobotGrrl.com/ Code licensed under: CC-BY

Parameters:
_ConsumerKey - authorization consumer key
_ConsumerSecret - authorization consumer secret
_AccessToken - access token
_AccessTokenSecret - access token secret

setReturnType

public void setReturnType(int _returnType)
Parameters:
_returnType - sets globally what type the methods will return - STRING_ARRAY returns all of the properties as an array of String items - OBJECT returns an Object whose properties are accessible via their respective methods
